title: SWK Holdings Corporation Announces Financial Results for First Quarter 2022 - Yahoo Finance
content: SWK Holdings Corporation Announces Financial Results for First Quarter 2022  Yahoo Finance
description: SWK Holdings Corporation (Nasdaq: SWKH) ("SWK" or the "Company"), a life science focused specialty finance company catering to small- and mid-sized commercial-stage companies, today provided a business update and announced its financial and operating results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2022.
